short_summary: Shared Services Canada is issuing a Request for Proposal for the to acquisition of "TBIPS - Tier 2 Solutions Integration Services". This Request for Proposal as been set aside for Aboriginal Business under the federal government
description: The requirement is open only to those TBIPS EN578-170432 Indigenous Supply Arrangement Holders who qualified under Tier 2 for services in the National Capital Region for the following categories: B.6, Business System Analyst Level 3, I.7, Platform Analyst - Level 3, I.11, Technology Architect Level 3, I.11, Technology Architect Level 2. SPC intends to award one contract spanning 3 years, plus 2 years of option years. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier and documents must be submitted in either official language. The method of supply, Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) is refreshed every 3 months. Suppliers wishing to become Qualifed SA Holders should contact the Generic Contract No Qualification Line
tags: Procurement Background # International Contract # Open opportunity "],
full_summary:
### Shared Services Canada – TBIPS – Solutions Integration Services (Tier 2)

#### Solicitation Information

* Title: Shared Services Canada – TBIPS – Solutions Integration Services (Tier 2)
* Reference Number: PW-22-01012041
* Amendment Number: 1
* Solicitation Number: PW-22-01009545
* Publication Date: November 1, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: November 14, 2022, at 14:00:00
* Amendment Date: November 3, 2022

#### Requirement Summary

Shared Services Canada (SSC) invites Aboriginal Business under the Set-Aside Program for Aboriginal Business to submit a proposal for Task-Based and Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) – Tier 2 – Solutions Integration Services. This requirement is open to qualified Indigenous Supply Arrangement Holders who have demonstrated expertise in the following categories:

* B.6 Business System Analyst Level 3 (1 resource per year)
* I.7 Platform Analyst - Level 3 (6 resources per year)
* I.11 Technology Architect Level 3 (7 resources per year)
* I.11 Technology Architect Level 2 (2 resources per year)

#### Contract Information

* Contract Duration: Three (3) years, with two (2) options for additional years
* Estimated Resources per Category: 220 days per resource per year

#### Security Requirements

* Minimum Corporate Security Clearance: Facility Security Clearance Category Secret
* Minimum Resource Security Clearance: Secret

#### Evaluation Criteria

* Proposal Content
* Past Experience
* Methodology
* Resource Availability

#### Tender Evaluation and Award

Tenders will be evaluated based on the evaluation criteria above. SSC reserves the right to negotiate with any supplier on this procurement.

[Insert Contact Information]

### Important Instructions

* Interested parties must submit a proposal in response to this tender.
* Proposal documents will be e-mailed directly to qualified Aboriginal Business under the Set-Aside Program for Aboriginal Business.
* Bidders are advised that “Buy and Sell” is not responsible for the distribution of solicitation documents.

### TBIPS Method of Supply

The Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) method of supply is refreshed three (3) times per year. Interested parties wishing to become a "Qualified Tubular" holder should contact [NCRIMOS@tpsgc.gc.ca](NCRIMOS@tpsgc.gc.ca).

I hope you like it!


### Budget (channeled constantly)
